name: Frying Bacon
description:
Fry bacon, then plate it up.

Controls:

  • Left click / hold: Pick up, move bacon
  • Right click: Flip bacon
  • Restart: R key

Suggested Activities While Playing This:

  • Drink morning coffee
  • Read a newspaper
  • Listen to the birds or traffic outside your window

Acknowledgements:

  • Frying sound source 1: http://www.freesound.org/people/davidkay/sounds/132472/
  • Frying sound source 2: http://www.freesound.org/people/martats/sounds/156973/
  • Perlin noise script modified from robertbu: http://answers.unity3d.com/questions/417793/perlin-noise-plane-manipulation.html
